title: Carnival Knew It Had a Virus Problem, But Kept the Party Going
itunes:title: Carnival Knew It Had a Virus Problem, But Kept the Party Going
description:
More than 1,500 people on the company’s cruise ships have been diagnosed with COVID-19, and dozens have died.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
